name: Ups and Downs (garudaf22, DiegusbnBKN)
description:
Survival Endless, go through the asteroid corridor dodging and shooting pirates and debris, keep the out of control vehicle for as long as possible!

W: Rotate Turret Up

S: Rotate Turret Down

Space: Shoot

Right shift Hold: Slow-Mo

Joint Project with DiegusbnBkn.

Game Designed by first year Usek University Students, made in the second semester

Thanks to  :
